name: Conflict of Heroes: Awakening the Bear
description: This exciting new release is a faithful adaptation of the renowned Conflict of Heroes board game that won the Origins Historical Game of the Year, Charles Roberts Wargame of the Year and the James F. Dunnigan Design Elegance Award, as well as many others!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, Vista, 7/8/10 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX 9.0c Dedicated Video Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Supported

reviews.review_text: Never played the boardgame but I really enjoy this game. Easy to learn rules but alot of strategy built in.
